findings.rationale: Absence of indemnification obligations increases liability risk for the Receiving Party in case of breaches or third-party claims.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights may hinder the Disclosing Party's ability to ensure compliance with confidentiality obligations.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: A fixed term of three years may not provide adequate protection for long-term confidential relationships.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.
